description: Gridcoin Stakebox Companion App The PiGrid Companion app allows you to find and control your PiGrid device/s easily and comfortably via your Smartphone or Tablet. PiGrid is a platform for Gridcoin currently running on Raspberry Pi. Gridcoin is a cryptocurrency that incentivizes the donation of computational power to scientific projects through BOINC. Find more information at pigrid.com and gridcoin.io. AntiFeatures: * NonFreeNet - This app requires a PiGrid device, which contains proprietary software.
